Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "递归组件中变量不共享" (#6780) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.4.4

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/anon/pen/PJBqbL?editors=1011](https://codepen.io/anon/pen/PJBqbL?editors=1011)

### Steps to reproduce
点击 菜单1-2-1 和 菜单1-2-2 背景色可以切换，而点击其他不同层级下的叶子结点，背景色没有切换，因为我通过改变activeId的值来动态设置class

### What is expected?
activeId可以再不同层级下是唯一的，就是无论点击那个层级的叶子结点菜单，改变的都是同一个activeId

### What is actually happening?
每个层级有单独activeId

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "2.8 & 3.0 router-view props bug" (#1800) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.8.0

### Reproduction link
[http://jsfiddle.net/9r6xhqbp/38/](http://jsfiddle.net/9r6xhqbp/38/)

### Steps to reproduce
click /foo, msg is undefined

### What is expected?
before 2.8.0, msg == 123

### What is actually happening?
msg is undefined
